# Climate Change Data

## Read in Data

```{r}

clim_change <- read_excel(here("data", "FINAL_DATASET_PCE_qPCRs_RIBBiTR.xlsx"))


```

## Clean Data

-   100 = its copies

```{r}

climate_qpcr_data <- clim_change %>% 
  select(SWAB, zoo.load..100) %>% 
  rename(bd_swab_id = SWAB) %>% 
  filter(!bd_swab_id == ".") %>% 
  mutate(extraction_kit = "ibi_spin_column_blood_tissue_kit",
         master_mix = "taqman",
         replicate = "singley",
         qpcr_machine = "quantstudio_3",
         extract_lab = "becker_lab",
         qpcr_lab = "becker_lab",
         standard = "pisces") %>% 
  rename(average_copy_number = zoo.load..100)

```

# Landscape Data

## Read in Data

```{r}

landscape <- read_excel(here("data", "Landscapes_RoL_Becker.xlsx")) %>% 
  clean_names()

```

## Clean data

```{r}

landscape_qpcr_data <- landscape %>% 
  select(sample_id, plate, c(quantity_1:quantity_average)) %>% 
  mutate(extraction_kit = "ibi_spin_column_blood_tissue_kit",
         master_mix = "taqman",
         replicate = "singley", #????
         qpcr_machine = "quantstudio_3",
         extract_lab = "becker_lab",
         qpcr_lab = "becker_lab",
         standard = "pisces") %>% 
  rename(qpcr_plate_id = plate,
         average_copy_number = quantity_average)


```
